ARABIC: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Its shading branches will droop down over them, its ripe fruit hanging ready to be picked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The shadows will bend over them, and low will hang the clusters of grapes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The shades of Paradise will bend over them, and its fruits will be brought within their easy reach;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The shades of the garden will be closely spread over them and it will be easy for them to reach the fruits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And its shade will cover them, and its fruit clusters brought down low for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the shade thereof is close upon them, and the bunches of fruit thereof will hang low within their reach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And close down upon them (shall be) its shadows, and its fruits shall be made near (to them), being easy to reach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: near them shall be its shades, and its clusters hung meekly down,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The shade thereof is close upon them and the clustered fruits thereof bow down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the shading branches of trees will come down low over them, and their clusters of fruit, will hang down where they are the easiest to reach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And close upon them will be the shades thereof, and low will hang the clusters thereof greatly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Its shades will be close over them and its clusters [of fruits] will be hanging low.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the shades of the (Garden) will come low over them, and the bunches (of fruit), there, will hang low in humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the shade thereof is close upon them, and the bunches of fruit thereof will hang low within their reach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Near them shall be its shades with its clusters hung gently down,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Its shade hovering over them, and its fruit brought low within reach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:14] And close (dāniyatan is a supplement to the [syntactical] locus of the clause lā yarawna, in other words, [it is a supplement to the import] ghayra rā’īna) over them will be its shades, its trees, and its clusters [of fruits] will hang low, its fruits will brought close, so that they are reached by the one standing, the one sitting or the one lying down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The shade) of trees (thereof is close upon them and the clustered fruits thereof bow down) are made close and available to them.
